com.adp.marketplace.connection.core

Interface ADPAPIConnection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthorizationCodeConnection, ClientCredentialsConnection

    public interface ADPAPIConnection

    ADPAPIConnection is an interface for all Connection Types instantiated based on GrantType which allows an application to configure connections

    ADPAPIConnection exposes the common methods that are available for connection types.

    Author:
    tallaprs
    See Also:
    AuthorizationCodeConnection, ClientCredentialsConnection

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connect()
      Initiates a connect request to ADP Authorization Server or Token Server based on the type of connection configuration.
      void disconnect()
      Invokes API to disconnect the connection - currently this method is implemented to reset the connection to null
      Token getToken()
      Returns a Token associated with this connection
      boolean isConnectionIndicator()
      Returns true by verifying if token is present in the connection and if token is not expired since time of issue.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        void connect()
      throws ConnectionException

        Initiates a connect request to ADP Authorization Server or Token Server based on the type of connection configuration. Validations are performed on the connection configurations and if request is valid access token will be issued and Token is mapped with this connection. In case of error, connection exceptions are thrown or error details are returned

        Throws:
        ConnectionException - A connection exception is thrown in case of incomplete configuration,invalid configurations data passed or server error

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
         throws ConnectionException
        Invokes API to disconnect the connection - currently this method is implemented to reset the connection to null
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - A connection exception is thrown in case of incomplete configuration,invalid configurations data passed or server error

      • getToken

        Token getToken()
        Returns a Token associated with this connection
        Returns:
        Token a simple value object with token server response
        See Also:
        Token

      • isConnectionIndicator

        boolean isConnectionIndicator()
        Returns true by verifying if token is present in the connection and if token is not expired since time of issue. Returns false otherwise.
        Returns:
        boolean
